ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ACE Solar Wind Ion Composition Spectrometer (SWICS) Solar Wind Plasma Elemental and Isotopic Density, Speed, Thermal Speed, Charge State, and Ratio Parameters, Level 2 (L2), 1 h Data
ResourceHeader.Description:
This ACE SWICS/SWIMS Data Set contains the Alpha Particle Number Density, Fe/O Abundance Ratio, C, O, Mg, Si, Fe Average Charge States, C+6/C+4, C+6/C+5, O+7/O+6 Charge State Ratios, He+2, C+5, O+6, Fe+10 Speeds and Thermal Speeds, and a Solar Wind Type Parameter that characterizes the Solar Wind as either Streamer, Coronal Hole, Coronal Mass Ejection (CME), or Unidentified.
The Solar Wind Ion Composition Spectrometer (SWICS), prior to August 23, 2011 and denoted as SWICS Version 1.1, determines uniquely the Chemical and Ionic Charge State Composition of the Solar Wind, the Temperatures and Mean Speeds of major Solar Wind Ions at all Speeds above 300 km/s for Protons and 170 km/s for Fe+16, and resolves Protons and Helium Isotopes of Solar and Interstellar Sources. SWICS 1.1 measures the Distribution Functions of Interstellar Cloud Pick-Up Ions and Interplanetary Dust Cloud Pick-Up Ions up to Energies of 100 keV/e.
The ACE SWICS 1.1 Data Products represent a new Release of the Data with significantly improved Time Series Measurements for the Elemental Abundance, Charge State Composition, and Kinetic Properties of Heavy Ions in the Solar Wind. It is a major new Update produced with completely redesigned Analysis Methods to account more rigorously for Instrumental and Statistical Effects (Shearer et al., 2014). Rare Elements are now identified more reliably and Estimates of Statistical Error are provided. Release Notes are available that describe the Data, the Methods used to determine the Data Values, and Issues concerning Data Quality and Measurement Uncertainty.
The Quality of ACE Level 2 Data is such that it is suitable for serious Scientific Study. However, to avoid Confusion and Misunderstanding, it is recommended that Users consult with the appropriate ACE Team Members before publishing Work derived from the Data. The ACE Team has worked hard to ensure that the Level 2 Data are free from Errors, but the Team cannot accept Responsibility for Erroneous Data, or for Misunderstandings about how the Data may be used. This is especially true if the appropriate ACE Team Members are not consulted before Publication. At the very least, Preprints should be forwarded to the ACE Team before Publication.
For more Information about the SWICS Instrument, visit the SWICS Home Page at http://solar-heliospheric.engin.umich.edu/ace.

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time, Beginning of Interval
Parameter.Caveats: Average Type: standard This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Time PB5
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Time PB5, Time of Observation, Year, Day, and Milliseconds of Day
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Alpha Particle, He+2, Number Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Alpha Particle, Helium+2, Number Density
Parameter.Caveats: nHe2 is the Number Density of Alpha Particles in the Solar Wind, in #/cm^3

Parameter.Name: Alpha Particle, He+2, Number Density, Error
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Alpha Particle, Helium+2, Number Density, Statistical Uncertainty
Parameter.Caveats: nHe2_err is the Statistical Uncertainty in the Number Density of Alpha Particles in the Solar Wind, in #/cm^3

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind He+2 Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Alpha Particle, Helium+2, Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vHe2 is the mean Alpha Particle Speed in the Solar Wind, in km/s

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind He+2 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Alpha Particle, Helium+2, Thermal Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vthHe2 is the Alpha Particle Thermal Speed in the Solar Wind, in km/s

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind He+2 Speed, Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Alpha Particle, Helium+2, Speed, Data Quality Flag
Parameter.Caveats: He_qual is the Data Quality Flag for Helium Speed and Density Data. 0=Good Quality. Non-Zero=See Release Notes.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind C+5 Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Carbon+5 Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vC5 is the mean Carbon+5 Ion Speed in the Solar Wind, in km/s.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind C+5 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Carbon+5 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vthC5 is the Thermal Speed of Carbon+5 in the Solar Wind, in km/s.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind C+5 Speed, Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Carbon+5 Speed, Data Quality Flag
Parameter.Caveats: C5_qual is the Quality Flag for C+5 Speed and Thermal Speed Data. 0=Good Quality. Non-Zero=See Release Notes.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind O+6 Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Oxygen+6 Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vO6 is the mean Oxygen+6 Ion Speed in the Solar Wind, in km/s.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind O+6 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Oxygen+6 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vthO6 is the Thermal Speed of Oxygen+6 in the Solar Wind, in km/s.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind O+6 Speed, Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Oxygen+6 Speed, Data Quality Flag
Parameter.Caveats: O6_qual is the Quality Flag for O+6 Speed and Thermal Speed Data. 0=Good Quality. Non-Zero=See Release Notes.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Fe+10 Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Iron+10 Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vFe10 is the mean Fe+10 Ion Speed in the Solar Wind, in km/s.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Fe+10 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Iron+10 Thermal Speed
Parameter.Caveats: vthFe10 is the Thermal Speed of Fe+10 in the Solar Wind, in km/s.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Fe+10 Speed, Flag
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Iron+10 Speed, Data Quality Flag
Parameter.Caveats: Fe10_qual is the Quality Flag for Fe+10 Speed and Thermal Speed Data. 0=Good Quality. Non-Zero=See Release Notes.

Parameter.Name: C+6/C+4, Charge State Ratio
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Carbon, C+6/C+4, Solar Wind Charge State Ratio
Parameter.Caveats: C6to4 is the C+6/C+4 Solar Wind Charge State Ratio

Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Carbon, C+6/C+4, Solar Wind Charge State Ratio, Statistical Uncertainty

Parameter.Description: Carbon, C+6/C+4, Solar Wind Charge State Ratio, Data Quality Flag

Parameter.Name: C+6/C+5, Charge State Ratio

Parameter.Name: Fe/O, Elemental Abundance Ratio
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH

Parameter.Caveats: FetoO_qual is the Quality Flag for Fe/O Ratio. 0=Good Quality. Non-Zero=See Release Notes.

Parameter.Name: Solar Wind Type
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH
Parameter.Description: Solar Wind Type: 0=Streamer, 1=Coronal Hole 2=Coronal Mass Ejection (CME), 3=Unidentified
